page.title: 11OUR VILLAGE POLICEMAN
page.content: Our village policeman has been in the Force for ten years and for eight of them he has been stationed at Broadwas. When he was a boy he wanted to be an engine driver but when he became a young man he joined the Royal Navy after service in the navy he left and did odd jobs for two years before becoming a policeman. The area he has to cover stretches either side of the A44 going West from the boundary of Worcester City to the river bridge at Knightwick. In this area there are about 2700 people.
